text: minisunva (trptiyata pat kirimata) avasya udaharanayan siyalla mema kuranayayehi niyata vasayenma api pavasa ættemu. (meya bara nogat ovun kæmati vana) kumana sadhakayak oba ovun veta gena giya vuvada, (nabiye!) “obat (obata lædi ayat) borukarayinma misa, vena kisiveku nova” yayi mema pratiksepa karannan pavasannaha
